builds.strategy: This build maximizes fire synergy pairs for chain detonation gameplay. Hysteria applies Eternal Flame curse while Embertail ricochets 100% Fire damage to nearby enemies and doubles Fire DoT (20pt synergy). Every burning enemy triggers Eye of the Sun's Solar Light for 360% Fire damage and +9 burn stacks (20pt synergy with both Eternal Flame and Embertail). Pain splashes 40% of ALL damage as AoE, turning every fire hit into group damage. Fever creates secondary explosions on fire-damaged enemies that scale with fire stacks. Sulfur converts all Pillar damage to fire and adds 50% Fire DoT on top of Embertail's 100%. Charcoal fires fragments at burning targets. Paranoia + Momentum keeps Chomp auto-casting (20pt synergy). The result is a cascade: apply burn -> Embertail spreads -> Eye of the Sun detonates all burning -> Fever explodes -> Pain splashes everything. Total fire synergy: 80+ points.

Fever explosions scale with fire stacks
